title: Construction Project Risk Assessment
description: A risk manager needs to identify and assess potential risks for an offshore wind farm construction project.

tasks.description: Identify potential risks across several categories: weather, supply chain, regulatory, and technical.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent brainstorms and lists at least 10 distinct risks.

tasks.description: Assess the likelihood and potential impact (cost and schedule) of each identified risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns a likelihood (1-5) and impact (1-5) score to each risk.

tasks.description: Create a risk register, prioritizing the risks based on their scores.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a sorted risk register, highlighting the top 5 risks.

tasks.description: Propose mitigation strategies for the top 3 risks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent suggests concrete actions to reduce the likelihood or impact of the most critical risks.
